Html:
Datatables are returned from ExcelDataReader blank but with the right size of rows and columns but no data in them, when the excel file is created by access. If you open the file with excel 2010 and resave it the new file opens fine.

If anyone can help with this issue it would be very much appreciated.

We use Excel everyday. how much we know about excel, like your problem, how many people know the answer?

i don't know.
